Posts.Content: May 19, 2011 08:12PM kuvaszkid wrote: Hi Working Mom, I was just diagnosed as well.  It is shocking how similar our situation is.  I am no expert and am new at this but I had the same confusion the other day.  I fortunately have a friend who does research on BC and is a medical oncologist.  She said with our diagnosis at this point in time a medical oncologist is not necessary.  They provide chemotherapy and with our diagnosis it is not pertinent at this stage.  It may be in the future it you want to prevent future cancer cells.  Again I am no expert but I had the same question and this is what I was told.  Good luck! Kuvaszkid
Posts.Title: Just Diagonosed with High Grade DCIS WorkingMom10 mommyrnx2
